lines.text: Tell me. Do you love your country?
Well, I'd just died for it.

[every time he introduces himself]
General Pompellio Montezuma De La Vilia De Conde De La Rue.
Do you understand German, Mr. Marvin?
No, but I speak it fluently.
Oh, I'm to have an assistant, am I?
Yes, and in the circumstances, a very useful one. We call him the "Hairless Mexican".
Well, chiefly because he's got a lot of curly hair and isn't a Mexican. You can call him The General. He isn't a general, but he'll appreciate the compliment.
This floor makes my beautiful leg very angry.

[introducing himself]
General Pompellio Montezuma De La Vilia De Conde De La Rue
Ah, do you mind if I call you Charlie?
General Pompellio Montezuma De- oh, we've already met.
We aren't hunting a fox, we're hunting a man. He's an oldish man, with a wife. Oh, I know it's war and it's our job to do it, but that doesn't prevent it being murder - simple murder!
